channel.title: Scatter Plot on Edward Chavis's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Scatter Plot on Edward Chavis's blog

item.title: Scatter Plots
item.description: library(sqldf) library(Lahman) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) #extracting the data--------------------------------------- query<-"SELECT playerID, sum(HR) AS career_HR, sum(SO) AS career_SO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>=400" result<-sqldf(query) # visualizing the data------------------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_point(data=result,aes(x=career_SO,y=career_HR),size=3,color="blue")+ ggtitle("Career Strikeouts VS Homeruns for great Hitters")+ xlab("Career Strikeouts")+ ylab("Career Homeruns")
